name: getrandompassword
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool random_chunk_api.
Tool description: A simple random picker for names, movies, TV shows, quotes, and numbers. A simple JSON object, user object, and array generator.
API description: Generates a random password string of the specified length using the Random Chunk API on RapidAPI.

length.description: The desired length of the generated password. Defaults to 10.
